bibl.title: The New Testament in the Second Century: Text, Collections and Canon.
bibl.note: An earlier version of this essay was given in the New Testament Textual Criticism program unit of the annual meeting of the Society of Biblical Literature, 17-20 November 2001, Denver, USA. - Textual Transmission of the New Testament Writings. - Newly Published Manuscripts. - Second-Century Citations. - Collections. - Canon. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Transmission and Reception: New Testament Text-Critical and Exegetical Studies

bibl.seg: HURTADO Larry W., The New Testament in the Second Century: Text, Collections and Canon.

J.W. CHILDERS and D.C. PARKER (Edd.), Transmission and Reception: New Testament Text-Critical and Exegetical Studies = Texts and Studies. Contributions to Biblical and Patristic Literature. Third Series. 4 (Piscataway, NJ, 2006) pp. 3-27.

An earlier version of this essay was given in the New Testament Textual Criticism program unit of the annual meeting of the Society of Biblical Literature, 17-20 November 2001, Denver, USA. - Textual Transmission of the New Testament Writings. - Newly Published Manuscripts. - Second-Century Citations. - Collections. - Canon. - Conclusion.
